text:
@kumailn Here is your #COVID19 #vaccine:

Between washes, leave your eyes/nose/mouth alone like your LIFE depends on it.

Make it more habitual than breathing to check your hands for the smell of soap/sani before touching any moist facial feature.

You can't spread what you don't have.
